segments.text: I recently graduated from college as an English major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you don't have much related work experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Admittedly , I don't . But I still beg you to give me an opportunity , and I'm willing to learn with my best effort .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , did you get any honors or rewards in college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have got a Business English Certificate and a Certificate of TEM 8 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got professional training in this field , and I believe I can fit the position well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have taken some courses in college , such as translation , business English , and so on . So I have a good mastery of both spoken and written English
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your approval would be my honor .
segments.speaker: S2
